articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets rise as Wall Street lifted by hopes of debt ceiling deal - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks on Wall Street closed higher as investors hoped congressional leaders and President Joe Biden could come to a deal on the U.S. debt ceiling.
articles.content:
Montana became the first U.S. state to impose a complete ban on video app TikTok.
